part_description: Two silver blades joined by a pivot, black plastic handles with oval loops, positioned opposite each other.
internal_interaction_description: The two blades are connected at a pivot point, allowing them to open and close in a scissor-like motion. The handles provide leverage, enabling the blades to come together and cut materials placed between them effectively.
external_interaction_description: The scissors interact with materials by cutting through them when the handles are squeezed together. They can be used by a person to cut paper, fabric, or other thin materials, requiring manual operation for precise control.
